content.1: And he looked up, and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury.
content.2: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites.
content.4: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God: but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had.

content.11: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places, and famines, and pestilences; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven.
content.12: But before all these, they shall lay their hands on you, and persecute
content.13: And it shall turn to you for a testimony.
content.15: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.
content.16: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents, and brethren, and kinsfolks, and friends; and
content.17: And ye shall be hated of all
content.18: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
content.19: In your patience possess ye your souls.
content.20: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh.
content.21: Then let them which are in Judæa flee to the mountains; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto.
content.22: For these be the days of vengeance, that all things which are written may be fulfilled.
content.23: But woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck, in those days! for there shall be great distress in the land, and wrath upon this people.
content.24: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.
content.26: Men’s hearts failing them for fear, and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth: for the powers of heaven shall be shaken.
content.27: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
content.28: And when these things begin to come to pass, then look up, and lift up your heads; for your redemption draweth nigh.
content.29: And he spake to them a parable;
content.30: When they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.
content.31: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.
content.32: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.
content.33: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
content.35: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.
content.36: Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.

content.38: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.
